label: Blu-ray and DVD Players
description: Devices for playing physical media such as Blu-ray discs and DVDs.
intents: Find a device to play my Blu-ray collection
Find a portable DVD player for travel

subcategories.label: Blu-ray Players
subcategories.description: Devices specifically designed for playing Blu-ray discs.

subcategories.label: DVD Players
subcategories.description: Devices specifically designed for playing DVDs.

subcategories.label: Blu-ray and DVD Combo Players
subcategories.description: Devices that can play both Blu-ray discs and DVDs.

subcategories.label: External Blu-ray and DVD Drives
subcategories.description: External drives that can play both Blu-ray discs and DVDs.

subcategories.label: Blu-ray and DVD Burners
subcategories.description: Devices that can write data onto Blu-ray and DVD discs.
